user_query: I'm planning a trip to Newfoundland and Labrador for a fishing expedition and I need to find a suitable hotel near the fishing spot. Can you provide me with the latitude and longitude of the fishing location? Additionally, I would like to know the average gas prices in Newfoundland and Labrador for budgeting purposes.

TaskList.description: Find coordinates (latitude and longitude) of the fishing spot in Newfoundland and Labrador.
Search for hotels near the fishing location using the obtained latitude and longitude.
Retrieve average gas prices in Newfoundland and Labrador.
